thread.title: U.S. House Committee Presses Drug Czar on Fentanyl - WSJ
thread.title_full: U.S. House Committee Presses Drug Czar on Fentanyl - WSJ

author: Jon Kamp
title: U.S. House Committee Presses Drug Czar on Fentanyl - WSJ
text:
U.S. House Committee Presses Drug Czar on Fentanyl Bipartisan group of lawmakers seeks answers as overdose fatalities hit new peaks in 2016 By @acampoflores Feb. 23, 2017 3:10 p.m. ET 
U.S. House lawmakers are pressing the nationâ€™s drug czar for more data on the dangerous synthetic opioid fentanyl, including how it is trafficked and how many people it has killed, in the latest effort to thwart a spiraling drug crisis. 
The four-page letter from the U.S. House Energy and Commerce Committee, signed by bipartisan committee leaders and reviewed by The Wall Street Journal, calls the fentanyl crisis a top oversight priority. Addressed to Kemp Chester, acting director of the White House Office of National Drug... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
